law.catch_line: Before the Secretary takes any action under § 9-1016 of this subtitle, the Secretary shall give the...

text.section:
Before the Secretary takes any action under § 9-1016 of this subtitle, the Secretary shall give the water quality laboratory against which the action is contemplated:
Written notice of the charges filed against it; and
An opportunity for a hearing before the Secretary.
The Secretary shall give notice and hold the hearing in accordance with the Administrative Procedure Act.
